item.title: Changelog: 4 Ocrober 2023
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Updated the Development History section of the Trivia page with info about the release of Update 1.5 and "Pier of the Unknown" DLC.

item.title: Changelog: 3 October 2023
item.description:
• Changed this website's font to Noto Sans.
  • Cassette Beasts shrine: Added link to my record of all the bootleg mosnters I have encountered to the Game Log page.

item.title: Changelog: 28 September 2023
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Removed the Developer Insight page since the official Cassette Beasts wiki not has a page for a list of interviews the Cassette Beasts staff participated in.

item.title: Changelog: 15 September 2023
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Updated the Developer Insight page by adding an Event Showcase section.

item.title: Changelog: 13 September 2023
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Updated the Trivia page's Development History section with new information about the "Pier of the Unknown" DLC.

item.title: Changelog: 11 September 2023
item.description:
• New blog post: Happy 1st Anniversary to Leilukin's Hub.
  • Updated the About page.
  • Modified blog style.
  • Added the blog's new layout to the layout archive.

item.title: Happy 1st Anniversary to Leilukin's Hub
item.author: Leilukin
item.description:
New blog post.

Celebrating the first anniversary of Leilukin's Hub and reflecting on the evolution of my website throughout past year.

item.title: Changelog: 10 September 2023
item.description:
• Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic shrine: Hide the right sidebar.
  • A Summer’s End — Hong Kong 1986 shrine: Change the content of the right sidebar.
  • Cassette Beasts shrine: Change the content of the right sidebar.

item.title: Changelog: 7 September 2023
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: The Articles page now includes other people's Cassette Beasts articles that I recommend.

item.title: Changelog: 6 September 2023
item.description: • Moved pages of my video game mods and playlists to My Creations page.
